doc:
Charles Wood (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Charles_Wood_(actor) 0 Christopher Charles Wood (born April 14, 1988) is an American actor. He is known for his role as Malachai Parker in the sixth season of the CW's television series The Vampire Diaries in 2014, after previously appearing on The CW's The Carrie Diaries in the role of writer Adam Weaver in 2013. He also starred in the 2016 CW television series Containment in the leading role of Atlanta police officer Jake Riley. From 2016 to 2018, he played Mon-El on the CW superhero series Supergirl. Christopher_Charles_Wood ( born April_14 , 1988 ) is an_American_actor . He is_known for his_role as Malachai_Parker in the_sixth_season of the_CW 's_television_series The_Vampire_Diaries in 2014 , after previously appearing on The_CW 's_The_Carrie_Diaries in the_role of writer_Adam_Weaver in 2013 . He also starred in the_2016_CW_television_series_Containment in the_leading_role of Atlanta_police_officer_Jake_Riley . From 2016 to 2018 , he played Mon-El on the_CW_superhero_series_Supergirl .
